content.question: ​The polynomial function <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 x open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus a close parentheses"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>, where <math alttext="a"><mi>a</mi></math> is a real number. Which of the following could be the graph of <math alttext="y equals P open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label:
The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve enters the window at (negative 1.7 comma negative 3.5).

The curve increases to reach a high point at (negative 1 comma 0).

The curve decreases to reach a low point at (negative 0.3 comma negative 0.4).

The curve increases to pass through the origin and exit the window at (0.5 comma 3.5).
